feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
